title: how is this possible?
body:

replies.body: Have you had prior restrictions on this account? If so, what were they and when?
recently like a week ago, but i i was't anywhere near toxic. people just hate the way i talk.

You constantly blame and berate your team for their performance in the game. You bring up peoples’ scores, accuse them of trolling or intentionally feeding, and almost none of your chat is actually useful information about the game.

Yes, you were toxic. And considering you had a recent punishment and didn’t improve your attitude towards others, you escalated to the next punishment tier. Keep in mind that if this behavior continues, you risk a permanent suspension, as that is the next escalation of punishment.

league is the only game where people reports you for anything you say, is unreal how much freedom you have in a game even in chat, anything you say is consider as toxic, and people gets offended by anything u say now days. is ok i get it
People come to play League to have fun and relax - not to see their team constantly arguing or berating them. Would you enjoy a game if someone was talking to you like you talked to your team?
u didn't see the chat of those games they literary all rage on me and cuss me out, im toxic when i didn't use a single cuss word?
You were overly negative almost the entire game in each game. You’re free to mute people if they’re being toxic towards you. You are not free to retaliate.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000001,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:44:27.128+0000)
>
> You were overly negative almost the entire game in each game. You’re free to mute people if they’re being toxic towards you. You are not free to retaliate.


so if i feel free to reply there message im toxic? just like right now u think im toxic because im replying back to your message right?

I identified in my second reply above (quoted below) why your replies were not just replies but were toxic:

>You constantly blame and berate your team for their performance in the game. You bring up peoples’ scores, accuse them of trolling or intentionally feeding, and almost none of your chat is actually useful information about the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Pharaohs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:37:35.744+0000)
>
> u didn't see the chat of those games they literary all rage on me and cuss me out, im toxic when i didn't use a single cuss word?

Toxicity isnt about curse words! The right thing to do would have been to mute them and report them after the game. You only have yourself to blame!

well if i dont reply back to them they report me for not communicating you should try and fit in my shoes of my games in chat, when i dont answer them they all report me for not communicating. is ok is time for me to move on this game community is too amazing ;) have a nice day

> [{quoted}](name=Pharaohs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=00000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:43:31.936+0000)
>
> well if i dont reply back to them they report me for not communicating you should try and fit in my shoes of my games in chat, when i dont answer them they all report me for not communicating. is ok is time for me to move on this game community is too amazing ;) have a nice day

Show me anywhere in the ToS/Summoners Codes where it states you NEED to reply back? Let alone the fact Riot has never ban someone for not replying. There is a huge difference between communication and retaliating. Riot wants you to communicate with your team so that it can help win you guys win the game. Tell me in the chatlogs you have, where does anyone help you guys in your game?
Try not being toxic and people won't report you.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=00000000000100000001,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:35:29.704+0000)
>
> Try not being toxic and people won't report you.


can u explain to me what is toxic? kind sir

tox·ic
[ˈtäksik]
ADJECTIVE

    poisonous:
    "the dumping of toxic waste" · [more]
    synonyms: **poisonous** · virulent · noxious · deadly · dangerous · [more]


poi·son·ous
[ˈpoiz(ə)nəs]
ADJECTIVE

    (of a substance or plant) causing or capable of causing death or illness if taken into the body:
    "poisonous chemicals"
    synonyms: toxic · noxious · deadly · fatal · lethal · mortal · death-dealing
        (of an animal) producing poison as a means of attacking enemies or prey; venomous:
        "a poisonous snake"
        synonyms: venomous · deadly
        extremely unpleasant or malicious:
        "there was a poisonous atmosphere at the office"
        synonyms: **malicious** · malevolent · hostile · vicious · spiteful · bitter · venomous · vindictive · vitriolic · rancorous · malign · pernicious · mean · nasty · bitchy · catty


ma·li·cious
[məˈliSHəs]
ADJECTIVE

    characterized by malice; intending or intended to do harm:
    "malicious destruction of property" · [more]
    synonyms: **spiteful **· malevolent · evil-intentioned · vindictive · vengeful · malign · mean · nasty · hurtful · mischievous · wounding · cruel · unkind · bitchy · catty · [more]


spite·ful
[ˈspītfəl]
ADJECTIVE

    showing or caused by **malice**: 


mal·ice
[ˈmaləs]
NOUN

    the intention or desire to do evil; ill will:
    "I bear no malice toward anybody"
    synonyms: spite · malevolence · ill will · vindictiveness · vengefulness · revenge · malignity · evil intentions · animus · enmity · rancor ·** bitchiness **· cattiness · maleficence


---------------------

basically - stop being bitchy.

> [{quoted}](name=Pharaohs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:28:35.395+0000)
>
> recently like a week ago, but i i was't anywhere near toxic. people just hate the way i talk.

Yeah people tend to hate the way people talk when they talk like condescending braggarts. I dont think your chat is that bad, but yes, i do hate the way you talk lol. I would assume you're a teenager if someone asked me, so don't worry about it, I shouldn't like the way teenagers talk, being the old cranky bastard that I am.

Stop arguing with your team.  Maybe people don't hate the way you talk, but rather the way you won't stop arguing.

Mute, focus on your gameplay, report, move on.
i stooped talking they continue i didn't want mute them just in case anything useful they were gonna say. league is the only game people report you literary anything you say.

If they are constantly harassing you, you can confidently declare that nothing they say will be useful, ever.

Just mute them. Really.

Because what is worth more to you, your enjoyment of League of Legends (also continued access to your account)? Or the 1 in 100 chance that someone flaming you will possibly say something useful that can't be communicated through pings? 

The 1 good game that comes from not muting is not worth the 99 bad games that come from not muting.

Why do you keep defending yourself, showing by this text you were indeed toxic. If the other players were toxic sure they should get reported but saying report so and so in-game often is really toxic even if it doesn't feel like that. But going by the chat logs you, yourself sent the report seems to be a  good act.

> [{quoted}](name=Verbally Abusing,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:50:08.697+0000)
>
> Why do you keep defending yourself, showing by this text you were indeed toxic. If the other players were toxic sure they should get reported but saying report so and so in-game often is really toxic even if it doesn't feel like that. But going by the chat logs you, yourself sent the report seems to be a  good act.
so pretty much what your saying is i have no right to talk?

> [{quoted}](name=Pharaohs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gpJPGZIF,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-10-02T14:51:49.184+0000)
>
> so pretty much what your saying is i have no right to talk?

O you have the right to talk just not saying bad phrases like what you said. Like I said defending yourself here does nothing for you. you posted your own chat logs that show you're toxic.

You were toxic. Not in the most extreme sense, but it's there. 

Also, this is way too much in chat for one person. Maybe it's just me, but anyone talking this much in game is kind of annoying. Pings bro.

"i just replied back"
well theres the reason why.
throwing oil at fire wont help.
When I play league, I want to play league. I don't want to see 2 kids having a fight. I'd report you and the others you were arguing with and report you all once the game is done.

This is pretty toxic because even if your team is verbally abusing you do not verbal abuse back. This may sound like you're losing your rights but your not your just being a better person. But yes this text is toxic.

is ok i understand the league community takes everything in to the consideration of toxic. abuse the meaning of toxic. that ur opinion. this game is unreal how much freedom you have in your words. is ok time for me to move on thank you for ur comment.
